name: gunlaxy
description:
You have a friend and want to play something together. Try this game!

This is a 2-player game, each player controls the spaceship and shoots the opponent. 

How to play:

  • The left spaceship uses W, A, S, D to move and Left Ctrl to shoot. The other uses UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT and Right Ctrl.
  • Who makes the opponent's health down to  0 will be the winner.
